title: 50:50 vision meets 2035 goals: First UAE–Kuwait Women’s Forum Opens in Abu Dhabi
summary_full: The inaugural UAE–Kuwaiti Women’s Forum in Abu Dhabi emphasizes women's empowerment, sustainable development, and future leadership, reinforcing bilateral cooperation. This initiative, aligned with national visions from both countries, fosters dialogue and collaboration on critical issues, including technology, peace, and climate action, while an accompanying exhibition showcases women-led businesses and heritage.
